text: A kogda kosnetsya cheloveka vred, on vzyvayet k svoyemu Gospodu , obrashchayas' k Nemu; potom, kogda On obratit eto v milost' ot sebya, on zabyvayet to, k chemu vzyval ran'she, I delayet Allakhu podobnykh, chtoby sbit' s puti.
